items.label: 58cbf8055457a3f106a6d668
items.name: Schedule RLC - Residential Low-Income: City
items.description:
A. Schedule RSC is for residential city customers.
B. Normal residential service shall be limited to single-phase.
C. If Schedules RSC, RST, RSS, RSH, RSB, RSE and RSL are applied to transient occupancy in separately metered living units, billing shall be in the name of the owner on a continuous basis.
D. Duplexes using a single meter prior to October 13, 1978 shall be considered as a single residence for the purpose of applying Schedules RSC, RST, RSS, RSH, RSB, RSE and RSL. For a new duplex or a larger service to an existing duplex, each residence shall be separately metered.
E. All electrical service provided for domestic uses to a single residential account, including electrically heated swimming pools, shall have all consumption of electricity added together for billing on Schedules RSC, RST, RSS, RSH, RSB, RSE and RSL.
items.basicinformationcomments:
Subject to the Rate Stabilization Account Adjustment of 1.5%
Monthly charge = (Daily charge * 365/12) + RSA
items.energycomments:
Adjustment = rate per kWh * 1.5% RSA Surcharge
Monthly charge = (Daily charge * 365/12) + RSA
